store.name: WearYourFavs
store.description: Anime-inspired necklaces featuring iconic characters and symbols from top anime series.

products.name: Luffy Necklace
products.description: A necklace inspired by Monkey D. Luffy from One Piece, featuring his iconic straw-hat pirate symbolism.

products.name: Zoro Necklace
products.description: A necklace inspired by Roronoa Zoro, styled with elements referencing his triple-sword combat.

products.name: Chopper Necklace
products.description: A cute necklace inspired by Tony Tony Chopper, capturing his adorable style and iconic hat.

products.name: Naruto Necklace
products.description: A Naruto-inspired necklace featuring a shinobi-themed symbol representing the Hidden Leaf Village.

products.name: Four Leaf Clover Necklace
products.description: A magical four-leaf clover necklace inspired by Black Clover, symbolising luck and the power of mana.

products.name: Kaneki Ken Necklace
products.description: A necklace inspired by Kaneki Ken, featuring motifs from his ghoul mask and dark transformation.

products.name: Gojo Necklace
products.description: A necklace inspired by Satoru Gojo, symbolising his signature blindfold and limitless abilities.

products.name: Guts Berserk Sword Necklace
products.description: A necklace featuring the iconic Dragon Slayer sword carried by Guts from Berserk.
